name: Methodize
description:
Use your fastest reaction skills to methodize and sometimes eliminate as many balls as possible!

As different coloured balls drop from the tube tap and hold the correct container to bounce the ball in.

Colour distraction, pattern changes and ever increasing speed all add to the mayhem and to make things indefinitely harder the containers will begin to overflow.

Utilising power ups to empty the containers is the only way to survive and obtain that ultimate high score!

- Share your scores and compete with friends
- Challenge your concentration and become the fastest methodizer!
- 3 Super fast addictive modes (more to come soon)
- Purge Mode (Collect the balls and don't let them overflow)
- Rapid Mode (Super fast action that only stops when you fail)
- Shift Mode (Rapid fast with a twist of switching things up)
